experience.title: Graduate Assistant
experience.description: As a Graduate Assistant, I supported students in the Inside Sales Lab and helped them improve their skills.Contributed to efficient class scheduling, minimized conflicts by maintaining the class timetable, and optimized course offerings. Played a vital role in gathering and analyzing student feedback to enhance curriculum and improve the overall learning experience for faculty and students.

experience.title: Finance Data Science Intern
experience.description: Developed internal software solutions using Python, Node.js, and other technologies to create user-friendly tools, streamlining processes, and boosting productivity by up to 15%. Utilized SQL queries for data insights, including tax collections from specific locations.Executed a project seamlessly integrating ArcGIS and SQL data for spatial analysis, empowering informed decision-making. Proficiently employed Excel for data manipulation and analysis tasks, contributing to data-driven decisions and efficiency gains.

experience.title: Graduate Student Assistant
experience.description: Developed an informational retrieval system using deep learning to process 20,000+ digitized handwritten notary documents, with experiments conducted on Cloudlab. Utilized knowledge graphs, RDFs, and SPARQL queries for data storage in Blazegraph.Enhanced data retrieval and ranking using Blazegraph's capabilities for processing 17th-century Spanish-American notary records, extracting characters with deep learning. Managed and retrieved data efficiently using Blazegraph, benefiting from features like Bulk Data Loader and FullTextSearch. Experiments ran on Cloudlab with multiple nodes.
experience.description_html: Developed an informational retrieval system using deep learning to process 20,000+ digitized handwritten notary documents, with experiments conducted on Cloudlab. Utilized knowledge graphs, RDFs, and SPARQL queries for data storage in Blazegraph.Enhanced data retrieval and ranking using Blazegraph's capabilities for processing 17th-century Spanish-American notary records, extracting characters with deep learning. Managed and retrieved data efficiently using Blazegraph, benefiting from features like Bulk Data Loader and FullTextSearch. Experiments ran on Cloudlab with multiple nodes.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Built resilient Java applications with Spring, Hibernate, and front-end tech. Utilized AWS Lambda and DynamoDB for scalable, secure client-specific solutions. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and develop highly scalable software components, incorporating cutting-edge technologies such as React.js, Angular.js, AWS Elastic Beanstalk, and CloudFormation. This joint effort included implementing performance optimizations like caching strategies and database query enhancements, resulting in a notable 20% boost in system performance. Additionally, comprehensive testing ensured accurate validation of system functionality, contributing to improved response times and scalability.
experience.description_html: Built resilient Java applications with Spring, Hibernate, and front-end tech. Utilized AWS Lambda and DynamoDB for scalable, secure client-specific solutions. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and develop highly scalable software components, incorporating cutting-edge technologies such as React.js, Angular.js, AWS Elastic Beanstalk, and CloudFormation. This joint effort included implementing performance optimizations like caching strategies and database query enhancements, resulting in a notable 20% boost in system performance. Additionally, comprehensive testing ensured accurate validation of system functionality, contributing to improved response times and scalability.

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: Worked on a Cloud-Based Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) system primarily aimed at local vendors. The project focused on streamlining business processes and enhancing operational efficiency for local vendors who cannot afford expensive computing services.Utilized a range of technologies, including Java, Angular, JS, SQL, and AWS technologies like AWS Lambda, EC2, and more, in the development of a Cloud-Based Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) system. The project was focused on streamlining business processes and enhancing operational efficiency for local vendors.
